concept.title: Write Statistics to Kafka
concept.shortdesc: When you configure a pipeline to write aggregated statistics to a Kafka cluster, you define connection information and the topic to write to.

conbody.p: aggregated statisticsKafkaKafkaaggregated statisticsYou also configure the partition strategy. The pipeline passes data to partitions in the Kafka topic based on the partition strategy that you choose. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed.
conbody.note: At this time, you cannot configure the pipeline to connect securely through SSL/TLS or Kerberos when using Kafka.
